nutanix_onboarding_title: Hosted Private Cloud powered by Nutanix
nutanix_onboarding_description: Explore our new, all-in-one, scalable Private Cloud platform. It combines pre-installed Nutanix Cloud Platform licences with OVHcloud infrastructures that are 100% dedicated and secure. You get a ready-to-use Nutanix hyperconverged infrastructure (HCI) in just a few hours.
nutanix_onboarding_description2: This solution is perfect for cloud migration strategies, implementing a Disaster Recovery Plan (DRP), and handling excess workloads.
nutanix_onboarding_guide1_description: Technical details of the Nutanix infrastructure at OVHcloud
nutanix_onboarding_guide2_title: List of included services and licences
nutanix_onboarding_guide2_description: Overview of services and licences included in the Hosted Private Cloud powered by Nutanix solution
nutanix_onboarding_guide3_description: Find out how the OVHgateway works
